eventDecorators.name: AssetBorrowFeeParamsDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: AssetBorrowFeeParamsEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: BaseBorrowFeeChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: FeeReceiverChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

functionDecorators.name: calcBorrowFeeAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns borrow fee for usdp amount for particular collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: getBorrowFee
functionDecorators.description: Returns borrow fee for particular collateral in basis points (1bp = 0.01% = 0.0001).

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

returnDecorators.name: feeBasisPoints
returnDecorators.description: The borrow fee in basis points*.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetBorrowFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the borrow fee for a particular collateral in basis points (1bp = 0.01% = 0.0001). Only manager is able to call this function.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

parameterDecorators.name: newEnabled
parameterDecorators.description: Is custom fee enabled for asset.

parameterDecorators.name: newFeeBasisPoints
parameterDecorators.description: The borrow fee in basis points*.

functionDecorators.name: setBaseBorrowFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the base borrow fee in basis points (1bp = 0.01% = 0.0001). Only manager is able to call this function.

parameterDecorators.name: newBaseBorrowFeeBasisPoints
parameterDecorators.description: The borrow fee in basis points*.

functionDecorators.name: setFeeReceiver
functionDecorators.description: Sets the borrow fee receiver. Only manager is able to call this function.
